Global Variable# kVTDecompressionProperty_TemporalLevelLimit

iOS 11.0+iPadOS 11.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.13+tvOS 10.4+visionOS 1.0+

```
let kVTDecompressionProperty_TemporalLevelLimit: CFString
```
